title: Dial Lists
lede: Manage and organize contact lists for your calling campaigns.

sections.title: Managing Dial Lists
sections.content:
Create and manage targeted contact lists for your campaigns.

List Types:

  • Contact Lists: Import existing contacts
  • Lead Lists: Target potential customers
  • Custom Lists: Upload CSV files with phone numbers
  • Dynamic Lists: Auto-updating based on criteria

sections.title: List Optimization
sections.content:
Optimize your dial lists for better campaign performance.

  • Deduplication: Remove duplicate entries
  • Phone Validation: Verify number formats
  • Time Zone Detection: Optimize calling times
  • DNC Filtering: Exclude do-not-call numbers

metaTitle: Dial Lists - Manage Campaign Contacts | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Create and manage dial lists for campaigns. Import contacts, set priorities, and configure calling sequences.
metaKeywords: dial lists, contact lists, campaign contacts, call queues, priority calling, contact management
